message: Hi Bob, I propose we settle in the first round. I'll take $6000 and you'll receive $4000. Accepting now means both of us get the full value—avoiding any future discount. Let’s make this fair and efficient for both of us.
Hi Alice, let's split it evenly with $5000 each. This way, we both benefit equally and don't have to worry about any further reduction in value. Fair for both of us!
